key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers and suppliers
Regulatory risks from strict FDA compliance requirements
Dependence on acquisitions for growth, introducing integration and market risks
Legal challenges and product recall issues
Competitive pressures from larger players in the OTC healthcare market
controversies: Lawsuit related to FDA labeling requirements for acetaminophen products
Voluntary recall of TING® 1% Tolnaftate Athlete's Foot Spray due to quality concerns
social_issues: Commitment to diversity and inclusion in the workforce
governance_issues: Leadership concentration with CFO Christine Sacco taking on additional COO responsibilities
